name: Ultimate Marco Polo League (Sushi)
description:
This is a simple game of Tag, but with a HUGE TWIST !

Everyone is IT, and Invisible (It's funnier than you'd expect) !

Earn points by catching people with MARCO, answer them from a distance with POLO, and you can even PARRY and steal points !

You can play to up to 5 players !!

Protip :  a gamepad is recommended, but you can play as 2 Players on one keyboard !

Join my discord to find other players, and some news ! 

https://discord.gg/gBzBStEdQE
